title: India GDP estimated at Rs 147.5 trn in FY22: MoS Finance Pankaj Chaudhary - Business Standard
content: India GDP estimated at Rs 147.5 trn in FY22: MoS Finance Pankaj Chaudhary  Business Standard
description: In a written reply to a query in the Lok Sabha, Chaudhary said the government has implemented several major reforms in recent years to boost investment and GDP growth
